reviews.customers_say: Customers find the shirt to be of good quality, with one noting beautiful stitching, and appreciate its versatility for dressing up or down. The fabric receives positive feedback, with one customer describing it as excellent for casual wear, and they find it comfortable. The fit is decent, with one mentioning it's flattering without showing too much stomach, while the length receives mixed reviews - some find it nice while others say it's too short. The sizing is also mixed, with some finding it true to size while others report sizing issues. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Simple shirt dress
items.body: I ordered 2 sizes of the same shirt (white) small and medium. The SMALL fit perfectly all around except for the bust area. It’s a tiny bit snug, but just a little bit. You can see from the photo how it pulls just a little . 5ft 2in (38” bust circumference 30” waist, 38” hips) I could have kept the small and been happy with the way it fit but I also ordered a MEDIUM . The medium fit better at the bust and the rest of the garment is a little more roomy but not significantly so. Overall, I found the medium far more comfortable so I chose to keep it and I returned the small. The fabric tags claims 65% cotton 35% polyester but feels more like polyester. It is a very casual and nice lightweight garment with a lot of flowiness. The white version is just a tad transparent so nude colored underwear is advised. Read more
items.author: C&C

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super Cute!
items.body: I absolutely love this shirt dress. The quality is good, I love the side slits, and it’s mostly not see-through. I styled this dress with a longer, thin tan sweater (perfect for cooler days) and some knee high brown leather boots. For the taller ladies, I’m 5’9” and it was a little shorter than I hoped with the last button being precariously high. Just have to be cautious when sitting down. Was obviously not a deterrent. Read more
items.author: Taylor

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very nice, but a bit short
items.body: This was comfortable, but the sleeve and dress length were too short. This may not be an issue for a shorter person. It definitely would have shown my nethers if I, personally, wore it as a dress. It would be fine as a layering item. The fabric is nice. It would be easy to dress up or down. The pockets (yay!) puckered despite the size bring fine. Maybe sizing up would fix this, but I'm uncertain as it wasn't tight or snug. Read more
items.author: Kindle Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Versatile and flattering -- perfect for dressing up or down.
items.body: I have worn this casually with sandals, teaching in it, but also have dressed it up wearing heels. The fabric is lightweight, and it hangs nicely without clinging. The pocket are a huge plus, and the high-lowhem gives it a stylish shape. It runs true to size and feels comfortable all day. Highly recommend if you are looking for simple, chic, and multi-use peice to add to you closet. Read more
items.author: Kayla Scott

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars It’s fine.
items.body: It looks fine but really holds the wrinkles - definitely polyester and does not breathe well. For the price it’s fine and the fit is decent. Fabric is as sheer as you’d think. Read more
items.author: Shesquietest

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good purchase
items.body: Very nice dress. I bought a similar one from Dillard’s a few years back paid just over $100 for that one. This one has pockets at the chest, which I’m not fond of, but it actually looks pretty good the material is soft and comfortable and this one is honestly more comfortable than the more expensive one I purchased from Dillards. Well worth it and I highly recommend it. Read more
items.author: Susan Sanchez

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Bought several
items.author: Appreciate great products but keep it real.

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Too late to return for large slash in front.
items.body: I bought this well in advance (2 months) of a cruise that was planned. I held it up and it looked the right size, but was quite wrinkled. Unfortunately I waited until I was packing for the cruise to iron it, and found a 6 inch long slash in the front -- it was not totally slashed, but streaked/frayed with about 2 inches that were split from whatever cut it. I'm guessing a box cutter could have made that happen. Now it is too late to return it, but thought I'd warn others. Check for things like this before you lose your chance to return! I know I will. Read more
items.author: LorieB

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: B Light Pink, Brown, Gray, Olive Green, Hot Pink02, Dark Gray, Dusty Rose Pink, A_a White, Orange Yellow, Dark Green, Mint Green, Black & White Buttons, Lavender, Medium Blue. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
